DelayedAttack.NAME: Delayed Attack
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of %1$s rounds, deal %2$s damage.
At the end of this round, deal %1$s damage.
At the end of %1$s rounds, lose %2$s health.
At the end of this round, lose %1$s health.

DelayedBlock.NAME: Delayed Block
DESCRIPTIONS: In %1$s turns, gain %2$s Block.
At the start of next turn, gain %1$s Block.

DelayedGainStrength.NAME: Delayed Gain Strength
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of %1$s turns, gain %2$s Strength.
At the end of this turn, gain %1$s Strength.

DelayedLoseStrength.NAME: Delayed Lose Strength
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of %1$s turns, lose %2$s Strength.
At the end of this turn, lose %1$s Strength.

Haste.NAME: Haste
DESCRIPTIONS: For each card played this turn,
gain #b10% more block from #yBlocks.
(Gain #b
% more block)

MalleablePlayer.NAME: Malleable
DESCRIPTIONS: On taking #yAttack damage, gains #b
#yBlock. #yBlock gain increases as
is triggered. Resets to #b
at the start of your turn.

Sleep.NAME: Sleep
DESCRIPTIONS: Remains asleep for #b
more turns, or until it takes damage.

RetainOnce.NAME: Retain Once
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this turn, you may retain #b
card
cards.

SpareTime.NAME: Spare Time
DESCRIPTIONS: Play a Ward for each energy used.

EchoLate.NAME: Late Echo Form
DESCRIPTIONS: The last card you play each turn is played twice.
The last #b
cards you play each turn are played twice.

Echonomics.NAME: Echonomics
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, the next discounted cost card you play is duplicated into your hand as a 0 cost card.
This turn, the next
discounted cost cards you play are duplicated into your hand as 0 cost cards.

Echoward.NAME: Echoward
DESCRIPTIONS: Play a Ward for card played.

Stun.NAME: Stunned
DESCRIPTIONS: Unable to act for #b
turn.

Time Warp Minor.NAME: Time Warp
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b
cards, your turn is ended.

TimeDilate.NAME: Time Dilate
DESCRIPTIONS: Removes
buffs from the enemy for
turns, and then restores them.

Augury.NAME: Augury
DESCRIPTIONS: Instead of drawing your hand at the beginning of your turn, choose
cards from your draw pile. Cards drawn by other sources behave normally.

WakeUpCall.NAME: Wake Up Call
DESCRIPTIONS: If this enemy falls asleep or is stunned, deal
damage.
